pageProduct.name: Thompson's Digestion Manager 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Digestion Support is a dietary supplement that supports & maintains healthy digestive system function.

Thompson's Digestion Support provides a combination of herbs and scientifically developed enzymes to support & maintain healthy digestive system function.

Based on Traditional Western herbal medicine, it is used to:

- Reduce & relieve abdominal spasm.
- Relieve digestive discomfort.
- Reduce & relieve abdominal.
- Cramping Reduce & relieve flatulence.

Boxed Contents: 60 Capsules

Size: 60 Capsules

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Reduce & relieve abdominal spasm
• Relieve digestive discomfort
• Reduce & relieve abdominal cramping
• Reduce & relieve flatulence
• Contains Ginger which has traditionally been used in Western herbal medicine for bloating and digestive spasms

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Contains Sulphites.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Per capsule:
Amylase (Aspergillus Oryzae) 6000DU
Protease (Aspergillus Oryzae) 12500HUT
Bromelains (Ananas Comosus) 10mg
Lipase (Rhizopus Oryzae) 200LipU
Tilactase (Aspergillus Oryzae) 1000ALU
Cellulase(Trichoderma longibrachiatum) 225CU
Papain (Carica papaya) 2mg
Ginger (Zingiber officinalis) pwd. 340mg
Peppermint (Mentha piperita) leaf ext. 250mg
derived from dry leaf pwd. 1000mg

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Egg| Fish| Nuts| Sesame Seeds

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
